aiplugin.name: msdynaib_AIQnAGenerator
aiplugin.humandescription: From the given Text generate questions and answers. example response: [ { Question:"What is Power Apps", Answer:"Power Apps is a low-code tool to build apps"}]
aiplugin.modeldescription: From the given Text generate questions and answers. example response: [ { Question:"What is Power Apps", Answer:"Power Apps is a low-code tool to build apps"}]
